tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Me and my husband both were suffering from covid-19. And that too while my 7th month of pregnancy which was very risky for my baby too. Then, We went too see Dr. Gaurav Thukran for our treatment on 02/05/2021 And with his medication, very soon ( almost within a week) me and my husband got perfectly fine. Medicines were totally pregnancy safe and with no side effects. The best thing was that the doctor encouraged both of us mentally as well. Under his treatment, we passed those days very easily & happily. Very friendly and polite doctor.

Such doctors are life saviours. A big thanks to you sir.
reply_text:
Thanks a ton ma'am
These words are my motivation
